item.title: Narnia
item.description: Narnia is one of the best wargames for getting started with Binary Exploitation.It starts with a very common types of exploitation called Buffer Overflow and then the difficulty gradually increases.We are provided with the source code so that’s another plus. It contains 10 levels starting SSH Information Host:narnia.labs.overthewire.org port:2226 To ssh into say level0 we type ssh narnia0@narnia.labs.overthewire.org -p 2226 and then we input the password narnia0 So starting off with
